entry.title: Scientific Python: From GitHub to TikTok
entry.summary:
Description

The Scientific Python project aims to better coordinate the ecosystem and grow the community. This talk focuses on our efforts to expand our community by generating a welcoming and friendly environment where people collaborate, build, and improve together. Come hear about our recent community building and outreach efforts, and …
entry.content:
Description

The Scientific Python project aims to better coordinate the ecosystem and grow the community. This talk focuses on our efforts to expand our community by generating a welcoming and friendly environment where people collaborate, build, and improve together. Come hear about our recent community building and outreach efforts, and learn how you can get involved!

Connect with us - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Website: https://scientific-python.org Forum: https://discuss.scientific-python.org Twitter: https://twitter.com/scientific_py YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/ScientificPython-org Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scientific.python Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/scientific.python TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@scientific.python

entry.title: Lightning Talks DAY 3 | SciPy 2023
entry.content:
Description

Lightning talks are 5-minute talks on any topic of interest for the SciPy community. We encourage spontaneous and prepared talks from everyone, but we can’t guarantee spots. Sign ups are at the NumFOCUS booth during the conference.

entry.title: Scientific Python: from `__init__` to `__call__`
entry.content:
Description

The Scientific Python project aims to better coordinate the ecosystem and grow the community. Come hear about our recent progress and our plans for the coming year!
